events.message: Customer reported a car accident that occurred on 2024-05-09 involving a collision with another vehicle at an intersection.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident based on the provided description of the vehicle collision.
An insurance agent was assigned to the case to assist with the next steps and provide guidance to the claimant.
Acknowledgement sent to the customer confirming receipt of the claim and outlining the process ahead.
Customer was asked to submit photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and driverâ€™s license for verification.
Customer uploaded all the requested documents including photos from the accident scene and official police report.
The investigation team began reviewing all submitted evidence and contacted the other involved party for statements.
Investigation concluded, confirming the customer was not at fault in the vehicle collision after thorough assessment.
A settlement offer was made to the customer, covering full repair costs and a rental vehicle for the duration.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the settlement proposal and praised the prompt communication by the agent.
The claim was formally approved following customer acceptance of the settlement terms and documented agreement.
Payment covering repair expenses was issued directly to the repair shop as per the agreement with the claimant.
After successful payment and resolution, the insurance claim related to the auto accident was officially closed.
All claim documents and correspondence were archived in compliance with retention policies for future reference.
